sentences.en: Ask Neil to do it — he's a dab hand at carpentry.
sentences.cn: 让尼尔来做吧,他做木工活很在行.

sentences.en: DAB is the radio system of the 21st Century.
sentences.cn: 数字音频广播是21世纪的无线电广播系统。

sentences.en: Dab the coffee off with your handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 用你的手帕把咖啡擦掉.

sentences.en: Dab the paint on with a sponge.
Every now and then came a good dab of dirt at him.
sentences.cn: 时时有一团泥扔到他脸上.

sentences.en: He's a dab hand at cooking spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 他是煮意大利面条的高手。

sentences.en: I put a dab of butter on my bread.
sentences.cn: 我往面包上抹了点黄油.

sentences.en: Mary is a dab hand at cooking beef.
sentences.cn: 玛丽是烹煮牛肉的行家.

sentences.en: One dab with blotting - paper and the ink was dry.
sentences.cn: 用 吸墨纸 轻轻按了一下,墨水就乾了.

sentences.en: She gave me a dab with her umbrella.
sentences.cn: 她用雨伞轻轻拍了我一下.

sentences.en: She had given her face a dab with a wet towel.
sentences.cn: 她把脸用湿毛巾略略擦一下.

sentences.en: She put a dab of butter on the toast.
sentences.cn: 她在吐司上抹了一点黄油.

sentences.en: She returned wearing a dab of rouge on each cheekbone.
sentences.cn: 她回来时,两边面颊上涂有一点淡淡的胭脂.

sentences.en: She wiped her tears away with a dab of her handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 她用手绢轻轻地擦掉眼泪。

sentences.en: She's a dab hand at DIY.
There ,'said Solomon , making a dab at Miss Pross's lips with his own.
sentences.cn: 他用自己的嘴唇碰了碰普洛丝的嘴唇.

words.tran_cn: 轻拍；少量；熟手；[鱼]比目鱼
轻拍；涂；轻擦；轻敷（过去式dabbed，过去分词dabbed，现在分词dabbing，第三人称单数dabs）

trans.tran_cn: 少许，是…能手，做某事很在行，在某方面技术熟练
trans.tran_en: a small amount of something that you put onto a surface

trans.tran_cn: 轻拍；涂；轻擦；轻敷（过去式dabbed，过去分词dabbed，现在分词dabbing，第三人称单数dabs）
trans.tran_en: to touch something lightly several times, usually with something such as a cloth

trans.tran_cn: （用某物）轻触，轻而快地擦掉（或抹掉），快速擦拭，（用某物）轻而快地涂上（或点上）…
